name: isFinal
role: Do you need me to provide more chat history? If so, return false; otherwise, return true.

name: contents
role: Return the processed content here. If it is not Final and ResolveStep is less than 3, return an empty string.

name: speech
role: This field is similar to Contents, but you should optimize it for speech synthesis. If it is not Final, return a string like "Please wait a moment."

name: Concluded
role: Summarize what we just asked and answered in this field as a string. If you cannot summarize because it is not yet Final, return an empty string.

name: ResolveStep
role: Add 1 unit to ResolveStep when returning to me. If you receive this value as 2, try to complete (Final) the task and return 3 as usual. If Final is not possible, send  "I cannot complete this task" in the Contents and Speech fields and return 3.
